sentence.Network_en: It is OK that firedrake fruit adds honey to eat together?
sentence.Network_cn: 火龙果加蜂蜜一起吃可以 吗 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2012年12月7日 - 而食人蘑菇(Cann. Fungus)的终极经验值是91,精灵战士(Elf Warrior)是87,火龙(Firedrake)是83;Boss级的怪物中,恐怖(Horror)终极经验值是1000,尤嘎(.

list.abs: I am received come over , have orange and firedrake fruit .我接过来，有橙子和火龙果。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English fȳr-draca, from fȳr (see fire) + draca 'dragon', from Latin draco

means.word_mean: 1. a creature of Teutonic mythology; usually represented as breathing fire and having a reptilian body and sometimes wings
